item.title: [LeetCode] 347. Top K Frequent Elements
item.author: Debakar Roy
item.description: Top K Frequent Elements Link to original Problem on LeetCode Given a non-empty array of integers, return the k most frequent elements. Example 1: Input: nums = [1,1,1,2,2,3], k = 2 Output: [1,2] Example 2: Input: nums = [1], k = 1 Output: [1] Note: You may assume k is always valid, 1 ≤ k ≤ number of unique elements. Your algorithm’s time complexity must be better than O(n log n), where n is the array’s size.
